metadata.title: Create parametric 3D room scans with RoomPlan

abstract.text: RoomPlan can help your app quickly create simplified parametric 3D scans of a room. Learn how you can use this API to easily add a room scanning experience. We‚Äôll show you how to adopt this API, explore the 3D parametric output, and share best practices to help your app get great results with every scan.

abstract.text: Xcode 14, Swift 5.7, iOS 16, macOS 13 (Ventura), tvOS 16, watchOS 9.

Discover the latest advancements in tooling to help you generate, inspect, and convert Universal Scene Description (USD) assets. We‚Äôll learn about updates to these tools and help you integrate them into your content creation pipeline. We‚Äôll also explore the power of USD Hydra rendering, and show how you can integrate it into your own apps.

Discover best practices and techniques to help craft magical AR experiences for iPhone and iPad. We‚Äôll provide guidance to help you determine if AR is a good fit for your experience, explore examples of great AR apps, and take you through key considerations when designing for augmented reality.

Join us for an exciting update to RoomPlan as we explore MultiRoom support and enhancements to room representations. Learn how you can scan areas with more detail, capture multiple rooms, and merge individual scans into one larger structure. We‚Äôll also share workflows and best practices when working with RoomPlan results that you want to combine into your existing 3D model library.
Session notes shared by the community for the community.
